Carl Räfting

About

I’m Carl Räfting. I have a huge interest in designing and building things on the web.

Background

I’ve had a website, in some shape or form, since 2006. But building my first website started a bit earlier than that. It was put together in Microsoft Notepad. There was no CSS, just some very simple HTML and some images. The website was a portfolio of my photos. The thing that got me excited when i built the website was the links. How cool wasn’t it that you could link to another page!? For me it was groundbreaking. It would seem a bit strange to get so excited about something as simple as links, but in fact it’s the foundation of the web. It makes the web what it is.

Since
